Hvordan brenner jeg PS2 spill????? How do i burn PS2 games???
Er det ISO???
does your PS2 need to have a chip inside to play the games you download and burn???
yes you need a chip to play burn games

no you don't need a chip, you need a swap magic cd or dvd, depending in what format the game is, break off the cover of the cd tray and use a slide tool to remove the swap disc and insert the game disc without the console knowing it. It sounds hard but I'm a girl and I've been doing it for a couple of years now.. so you should be able to do it as well
anybody willing to seed this again?
I'm on 99%, and its not downloading anymore, please, can someone seed?
This is probably corrupt, i downloaded using LimeWire and using uTorrent, on both cases the games stops on 99,8%!!!
